Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies.schedulingUtilities

Class SchedulingStrategyUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduling.schedulingStrategies.schedulingUtilities.SchedulingStrategyUtilities

  • public class SchedulingStrategyUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides several utilities that are considered to be useful during the scheduling procedure.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Method Detail

      • sortJobListByTheta

        public static java.util.List<JobSortContainer> sortJobListByTheta​(java.util.List<BatchJob> jobsToSort)
        This methods calculates the Theta_STDF values for all jobs and sorts them in ascending order.
        Parameters:
        jobsToSort - List of all jobs that should be sorted.
        Returns:
        Sorted list of JobSortContainer instances that encapsule the corresponding BatchJob instances.

      • sortJobListBySubmissionTime

        public static java.util.List<BatchJob> sortJobListBySubmissionTime​(java.util.List<BatchJob> jobsToSort)
        This methods sorts all provided jobs according to their submission time in ascending order.
        Parameters:
        jobsToSort - List of all jobs that should be sorted.
        Returns:
        Sorted list of BatchJob instances.

      • getNodeOccupationPlan

        public static int[] getNodeOccupationPlan​(java.util.List<BatchJob> allJobs,
                                          int schedulingIntervalLength,
                                          int currentTime)
        Creates an array of the length that equals the specified interval length. Each position in the array corresponds to a step in simulation time in the interval and will be filled with the amount of nodes that are active at this poin time, according to the current schedule.
        Parameters:
        allJobs - List of all jobs that are relevant for the schedule.
        schedulingIntervalLength - Length in simulation time of the interval for which the node occupation is requested.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the node occupation is requested starts.
        Returns:
        Array that indicates the amount of active nodes for each step in simulation time in the specified interval.

      • updateNodeOccupationPlan

        public static int[] updateNodeOccupationPlan​(int[] nodeOccupationPlan,
                                             BatchJob job,
                                             int currentTime)
        Updates an array (node occupation plan) of the length that equals the specified interval length. Each position in the array corresponds to a step in simulation time in the interval and is filled with the amount of nodes that are active at this poin time, according to the current schedule.
        Parameters:
        nodeOccupationPlan - Node occupation plan to update.
        job - Job that should be included in the provided node occupation plan.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval, to which the node occupation plan corresponds, starts.
        Returns:
        Update node occupation plan.

      • checkSchedulingFeasibilityForJob

        public static boolean checkSchedulingFeasibilityForJob​(int[] nodeOccupationPlan,
                                                       BatchJob job,
                                                       int currentTime)
        Checks whether it is possible to schedule a job at the start/restart time that is currently specified by the BatchJob instance.
        Parameters:
        nodeOccupationPlan - Array that indicates the amounts of active nodes for each timestep in the considered interval.
        job - BatchJob instance for which it should be checked whether it can be scheduled.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the considered interval starts.
        Returns:
        True when the job can be scheduled without exceeding the maximum amount of nodes, false otherwise.

      • determineEarliestTimeForNodeAvailability

        public static int determineEarliestTimeForNodeAvailability​(java.util.List<BatchJob> relevantJobs,
                                                           int amountOfRequestedNodes,
                                                           int currentTime)
        Determines the earliest point in simulation time at which the amount of requeted nodes are idle.
        Parameters:
        relevantJobs - List of all jobs that currently may occupy some nodes of the DC.
        amountOfRequestedNodes - Amount of nodes that are requested.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time that indicates the point in time at which the check should start.
        Returns:
        Earliest point in simulation time at which the requested amount of nodes are idle, according to the schedule that is defined by all provided jobs.
